title: Create navigation pages with consistent styling and integrate additional image renders

requirements.text: Create dedicated page components for each navigation link currently in the Footer component (About, Technology, Features, Contact) that maintain the same visual styling as the landing page, including MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (Liquid Silver, Nova Gold, Deep Space Black, Cosmic Blue, Solar White), Montserrat font family, dark gradient backgrounds, and consistent spacing/layout patterns

quotes: can we work on pages for the links to lead to keep the same style

acceptanceCriteria: About page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Technology page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Features page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Contact page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
All pages use the same color palette, typography, and layout patterns as LandingPage
All pages include the Footer component for consistent navigation

requirements.text: Implement client-side routing using React Router to enable navigation between the landing page and the newly created pages (About, Technology, Features, Contact), updating the Footer navigation links to use proper routing instead of href anchors

quotes: pages for the links to lead to

acceptanceCriteria: React Router configured in the application
Routes defined for landing page and all new pages
Footer navigation links updated to use React Router Link components
Browser URL updates when navigating between pages

requirements.text: Display the user-provided image renders on the appropriate pages among the newly created About, Technology, Features, and Contact pages, rendering them as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

quotes: i have other image renders to use on some of tem

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are integrated into the appropriate page components
Images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images maintain consistent styling with the rest of the pages
Images are responsive and properly sized for their context

constraints: Maintain the existing MOBIUS-NOVA brand guidelines throughout all new pages
Do not modify the Footer component's visual design, only update navigation mechanism
Keep the LandingPage component intact as the home/root route
nonGoals: Adding new navigation sections not mentioned in the current Footer
Implementing server-side rendering or static site generation
Adding blog or dynamic content management features

required: Technology page hero image showcasing multi-modal energy system (technology-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
About page background image with energy innovation theme (about-background.dim_1200x800.png)
Contact page header image with communication theme (contact-header.dim_1200x400.png)
